column2: §Y[GetMainOldGodName]§! has granted me §G[local_received_offmap_old_gods_currency_insanity_from_sacrifices_total_variable.GetValue]§! §YInsanity§! for sacrificing population of §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§!!
column4: §Y[GetMainOldGodName]§! hat mir für die Opferung der Bevölkerung von §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§! §G[local_received_offmap_old_gods_currency_insanity_from_sacrifices_total_variable.GetValue]§! §YWahnsinn§! gewährt!

column2: After the siege of §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§!, your troops sacrificed its population to §Y[target_sacrificer_commander.Religion.GetHighGodName]§!!
column4: Nach der Belagerung von §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§! haben Eure Truppen die Bevölkerung §Y[target_sacrificer_commander.Religion.GetHighGodName]§! geopfert!

column2: After the siege of §Y[target_sacrifice_location.GetName]§!, §Y[target_sacrificer_commander.GetBestName]§! sacrificed its population to §Y[target_sacrificer_commander.Religion.GetHighGodName]§!!
